std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Martha Magdalena van der Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Tulbagh, Baptism register, 1743 to 2 Feb 1800, page 224, entry number 44. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G4 7/1. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite, Trysie Joubert, Richard Ball as part of the eGGSA Project, from VC 657, Cape Archives Repository
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with berg anywhere in the surname with Martha Magdalena anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Martha Magdalena van der Berg baptism on 15 May 1785, daughter of Jacobus van der Berg & Martha Diederiks.

std_narrative.citation:
Martha, daughter of Jacobus van der Berg & Martha Diederiks, was baptised on 15 May 1785. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Martha Magdalena van der Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Tulbagh, Baptism register, 1743 to 2 Feb 1800, page 224, entry number 44. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G4 7/1. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite, Trysie Joubert, Richard Ball as part of the eGGSA Project, from VC 657, Cape Archives Repository
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with berg anywhere in the surname with Martha Magdalena anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Martha Magdalena van der Berg baptism on 15 May 1785, daughter of Jacobus van der Berg & Martha Diederiks.
